parameters: Maybe I should try calling Abby or Ciel?
No reply. It was worth trying.
Do you have phone phobia or something?
Stop messing around with my things!
It’s my phone? I always have it on mute.
Abby? I can’t hear you, there’s static!
Cici? God damn it, I can’t understand a thing!
God damn it! What if something is happening to them?!
Sorry, I’ve lost my cool for a second. Let’s go,
we’re that close to finish that necklace.
You said something about wanting to see me in full
I had a picture of the three of us on my phone,
It still kept the colours intact, so...
This is Ciel... How long since I've seen her...
Cry and I'll close my phone.
Maybe I should try calling Abby or Ciel?
No reply. It was worth trying.
Do you have phone phobia or something?
If the lock wasn't so old fashioned, I would've
tried to hack it. What a shame...
Stop messing around with my things!
Let's check the clues I've gathered.
The note in the entrance has a peculiar choice of words.
They said “this space” instead of “this house.”
Am I on a different realm? Is the street outside
not the street my house resides in?
Regardless, I can't jump to conclusions

My dearest sister,
Apologies for the turmoil my whims have brought upon you.
Yet, I trust you're finding joy amidst the chaos. We shall reunite soon,
as promised.
<WordWrap>Until then, keep the secret close—only you and I know what lies ahead!
I’ve got a bizarre and bone chilling call from my family.
While there was static and I couldn’t hear very well,
it gave me the impression they were worried I didn’t
That impression solidifies my gut feeling of being
teleported into a different dimension. The question
is when that teleportation happened and will
completing the necklace will bring me back?
How can I find it now? Is it a coincidence?
A part of a niche necklace...
When I'll complete this, I'll be able to leave this place
A part of a niche necklace...
When I'll complete this, I'll be able to leave this place
A part of a niche necklace...
When I'll complete this, I'll be able to leave this place
The 2nd part of the necklace is finally ours.
Which means, we have a half of a necklace!
Just 2 more puzzles to go and we can leave!
The 3rd part is ours! We're almost done with this puzzle!
NGL, I am having fun, still, I wanna go home already.
Something is happening, the necklace parts are
Do you have any clues about the changes in the
I thought, since you’ve been so fixated on it lately,
maybe you’ll understand why it changed?
I’ll take it as a no.
Who are you talking to all the time?
Why do you think you’re trapped here? A world
You don’t get the gravity of your situation, do you?
If a monster is chasing us, I’m leaving you behind!
There’s not going to be any monsters.
Say, have you seen a ghost around here?
It’s been bothering me for couple times, that’s why
I’m asking. It looks familiar but I can’t put the finger on it.
It’s ridiculous hearing you talking about the supernatural.
As long as it has logical reason, I won’t be a fool
Besides, we both experienced the same demon
Demon? I don’t recall such a demon...
You don’t remember being a witch-hunter?
You know, you take it well.
Being trapped somewhere unknown, being possessed...
What if what you’re doing is useless?
What if you’re walking in circles?
Only fools do the same thing over and over again,
We’ll get out of here, just trust my intelligence, alright?
I have no choice but to do so, I suppose.
Hey, can you promise me something?
Depends if I can keep it.
I want to see you again in full colours, someday.
Full colour? What do you mean?
Can you promise me that I will see it?
No, that would be a death flag.
Well, fine. I don’t understand your intention but
Just don’t kill me if this promise won’t come true.
We’ve been really looking forward for your arrival!
Well, it’s better late than never!~
I’m so happy you’re here with us, El!
We’ve just seen each other this morning...
(Something doesn’t make sense, she looks at me as
if I came back from the dead.)
Don’t think I’m helping you out of my goodness of my
heart! I’m only doing it to find a necklace piece!
The tsundere sisters are at it again!~
...\| Do you have a death wish?
(Why does it feel like she mocks me...)
Say, have you seen a ghost around here?
Since when do you believe in ghosts, science lady?
I only believe in them if there’s a logical reason
behind them. That’s why I ask, to check if I’ve
fully lost my mind or there’s a logical reason
Well, what does she look like?
It looks like a black silhouette of Nono...
Black. Her shape reminds me of someone but
I can’t put the finger on who.
S-Sorry, I can’t tell you more...
Say, why is the kitchen is like that?
I told you, it’s you who did it, you prankster!
I said I didn’t do it! At most I’ll throw a fake
cockroach at you, not cost a mess at our home!
Yeah, maybe you’re right... I- well...
Really now? Why start that sentence, then?!
We prepared a really special dinner for you...
Abby cleaned the garden, I prepared your favourite
recipes to make for you, Noel was the most excited
of us all, to finally reunite with her sister...
Why did such tragedy had to happen?
If only we came sooner, perhaps-
Stop it! I already said I’ve forgiven her!
It wasn’t her fault, we were just children!!
I’ve already moved on from this...
Crap. I hate being like this.
Sorry, El. Didn’t mean to bring up bad memories.
Don’t worry, I’m a living reminder of bad memories.
You'll need to lure the opponent Rook to get closer
to their king to destroy their defences.
You need to push the opponent's king to the
Do you remember what I've explained about castling?
Perform it to threaten the king.
You can perform castling here to threaten the king.
In one of the kitchen’s drawers and if not there,
inside the laundry room! To be fair it’s more of a
storage room than a laundry room as-
